attributes.action: redefine oil refinery in our minds ... examine off shore oil to combat short supply in reponse to the current "crisis" in oil prices - or is it that the only oil in the country is in Prescott's bath ?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain has traditionally always has it's own oil supply, yet, as Aurthur Scargill rightly warned, closing pits was just like putting our hands up - surrendering ourselves - like the soldiers in Iraq, now, by closing the oil refineries and minefields - why not reassure the country that you are actually taking the basic needs of industry seriously and

a) look re - opening the mines ?
b) call for a review of offshore oil rigs ?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
